util.result_filing¶

This module handles saving and visualization tasks for matadata and plots

Functions

init_config_vars(config) Initializes global variables from yaml config, once every main() call
save_meta_file(gen_dict, f_name) Write train_model or test_results metadata to specified file
visualize_train_data(train_df, fname) Visualize the time series input
